1.0.name: wordpress/cardoza-twitter-box
1.0.description:
Twitter Tweets Box is a Widgets let you display Twitter updates on your website. This plugin includes the following features and options

  1. Display your most recent Twitter updates on any webpage.
  2. Select width and height of the widget in the options.
  3. Live stream with loop facility.
  4. Background & Foreground color selection.
  5. Display your twitter messages on any page or post.

If you have any suggestions or feedback, please post it in the following link.

For more visit: http://www.vinojcardoza.com/cardoza-twitter-box/
